Author: andrefishmusic

Comment: If Trump or anyone in his administration is held in contempt by the Supreme or any other federal court, the judge makes an order and sends it to the U.S. Marshall service to arrest the person. The U.S. Marshall service does not report to the Supreme Court--It is part of the Executive Branch Department of Justice.   So if the Supreme Court issues an arrest warrant, it's up to Attorney General Pam Bondi to enforce it. You can see how that might be a problem. Hence, constitutional crisis.
